website_summaries.verdict: An extra-large bar of vegan soap with ingredients to soothe the skin and reduce irritation.
pros: Includes colloidal oatmeal, which helps calm sensitive skin
Antioxidant cocoa nibs fight free radicals
Does not contain palm oil or artificial dyes
cons: Scent is too heavy for some users

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 6/21/2019. I am still absolutely in love with this product! Not even sure how many times I’ve ordered them, but I hope they never stop making. Love the scent and lather. This rinsed off clean. Just ordered my second box. My husband and I both love this product! Second order arrived right on time. Love the fast easy service! For those saying it goes too fast I recommend don't let the water run over the bar. Wet your body and step out of the stream of water to suds up your body or washcloth. Remember coconut oil is solid at room temperature, but turns into a liquid at body temperature. Hot water speeds up that process.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap - except for strong fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd type of soap I've ordered from this seller (I've been very pleased), and it's the first for which I've thought the fragrance was too strong. I like to put the bars out to let them harden up a bit, but this one's fragrance was overwhelming to me. I eventually had to put it in my garage because it was too much in any part of my living space! But after letting the bars harden in the garage, I like the soap a lot - and actually like the fragrance now that it's not so strong.
customer_reviews.author: DrivinExplorer

customer_reviews.title: I have terrible dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible dry skin. Tried many products over the yrs. not a big fan of vanilla, but I know oatmeal agrees with my skin from past use. So I gave this stuff a try. It is a bar, but it's awesome. Skin feels great, don't need as much lotion on most areas. Leaves me refreshed and smooth. Plus does leave a clean soft smell. I also bought the lemongrass bars as well. I am interested in trying others since they have differing ingredients. But the made me a believer. Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: eric nelson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about using a bar soap. But desperate to get away from harmful chemicals, so I gave it a try. I will never look back! This soap is wonderful! I personally use the Soothing Vanilla Oatmeal bar soap and saw improvements in my eczema in about a week!! My daughter uses the Tea Tree bar soap to control under arm odor and no longer needs an anti-perspirant. We will be life-long clients and look forward to trying some of the other products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving one star just because they smell nice, but doesn’t look like in the picture at all and are very small. I bought them to use as a gift but I ended up keeping them because they didn't look appealing at all. Found similar product at the Whole Food Store on sell for the same price but bigger and very aspectuous
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Smell is amazing and lasts for hours
customer_reviews.text: Smell is amazing and lasts for hours. Cleans well and moisturizes. Only issue is if this gets on your hoohah. It can burn. Update: This is my favorite soap from Splendor. I've tried them all except for the exfoliating soap. The soothing vanilla oatmeal will have you smelling delicious all day. My second favorite is the French lavender. Same advice applies for your hoohah though... be careful down there! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your hands soft and smooth with a nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. It is true just swipe your wet hands on the soap bar two times and you get a beautiful smooth fragrant lather. It leaves your hands soft and smooth. My husband even likes it. His hands get rough from doing outdoor work and gardening. But this soap helps to take that roughness away. I have ordered this soap more than once in the vanilla scent which is a mild and not over power smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Strope

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item twice. Once for myself, then put it in a care package for my daughter. We both absolutely LOVED it! The scent is amazing without being overpowering, and neutral enough for male or female. Left my skin soft and moisturized without a film or residue. My only complaint would be that there’d be just a bit more for the price. Regardless, I’ll likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor DeVore

customer_reviews.title: Smells good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this soap smells, but I’m not sure I’d say it smells like the usually sweet vanilla scent I was expecting. It foams up super easily and a little does go a long way. So far my super sensitive skin seems to like this soap. I will likely buy more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality over quantity
customer_reviews.text: First off, it does the job! But I dislike that they are so small!!! After only two uses the bar on the far right is how it looks. I may get 4-5 more uses out of that one. I just expected more!!
customer_reviews.author: deamber

customer_reviews.title: Soap is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just switching back to a bar soap from a foam soap. Very nice scent. Lathers well also and does not leave any residue. My skin does not get dry as is has in the past with other bar soaps. All well thus far (after one week's use).
customer_reviews.author: Dane J. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work well for my sensitive skin. Literally burned, peeled and turned my skin red. The soap left my body feeling dry and itchy. Didn't care for the smell and was smaller than what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Dofini

customer_reviews.title: These soaps are very soft and nice feeling, when you touch the bar itself it ...
customer_reviews.text: These soaps are very soft and nice feeling, when you touch the bar itself it actually feels lotion-y. Foams up really well, especially when you rub it into a shower poof. Love that they're palm oil free, that's actually pretty hard to find. Vegan and small business is also great. These bars are on the small side, but get a soap dish/mat and keep it away from the shower stream, they should last. I keep mine outside the shower, not sure how much that actually helps though.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette E.

customer_reviews.title: The smell of this oatmeal bar though is awesome.. Good company
customer_reviews.text: I seldom leave reviews but 2 years ago I switched to a more natural approach with taking out every chemical I possibly could in my daily life through my water food hygeine products etc..I found this soap about 7 months ago, and haven't looked back since..I've tried several different types and they all work quite well in clearing skin up..The smell of this oatmeal bar though is awesome..Good company!!
customer_reviews.author: Derek K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappearing Act
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Smells nice. Nice feel. Only issue is how fast the bar dissolves. Not for daily use unless you can afford to keep several boxes on hand for the month. Decided to only use for shaving... occasionally. Or if I want to smell special :).
customer_reviews.author: Sharee

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and wife likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good and smells great! Haven't used it long enough to know whether it works as advertised, hence the four stars. Will update this review later to let you know how I feel after using this product for a time.
customer_reviews.author: Yosh

customer_reviews.title: Stings
customer_reviews.text: I found this soap irritating. The first soap I have ever used that actually stings. I don’t understand how this is possible if the ingredients are as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but not worth $ as it doesnt lather real well!
customer_reviews.text: So, it is lovely soap but not working up to a really nice lather which is what I was looking for. It is pricey but if it lathered it would be a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Freedomite

customer_reviews.title: Love ingredients love this soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap is great I love the way it lathers up and cleans my skin not leaving it dry at all. The smell is very light which I love because I don't like smelling like perfumed soap. This is second order of soap from this company very pleased with quality and ingredient list
customer_reviews.author: Wahlee

customer_reviews.title: Gave me minus, but added plus.
customer_reviews.text: I used the soap and it gave me allergic reaction. Despite of that, I continue keeping them in the closets and drawers for just enough soothing vanilla/oatmeal smell which makes me feel good.
customer_reviews.author: D.G rEvIeWs.

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this soap. I have super sensitive skin. I even have issues with "hypoallergenic" products. I use this every day and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: L.Melter

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! The scents are mild, pleasing, and non overpowering. I always feel clean afterwards without any residual. Will order again!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Best value Best quality
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I only use this soap. We love it and will continue to only this this one brand.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: My family and I love this all natural soap!
customer_reviews.text: I received it pretty quick and I am extremely satisfied with this pure coconut oil soap. My family all love it as well! The smell is fantastic and my skin feels so smooth and refreshed! I have used many all natural soaps, but this one has been the best by far. I will continue to buy these awesome soap from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soap!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. This soap has a very enticing scent and suds very nicely. Rinses clean. Really happy with this and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara F

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product but the bars are quite small for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but the bars are quite small for the price . It does not last long as similar products. I will continue to use it but hope they could make the bars larger and more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: These soaps are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a lot of handmade soaps and this brand is really my favorite. They don't disintegrate in your soap dish, they smell great and work fantastic. Will be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Weygandt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap
customer_reviews.text: We love home made soaps. They smell awesome, and make our skin happy plus ny husband likes the way they make his hair smell.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite soap ever!
customer_reviews.text: I initially received this brand of soap as a gift and loved it. I appreciate mostly that it does not use Palm Oil which is responsible for deforestation. I also love the simple ingredients and that it does not have a strong scent, it's subtle and wonderful! Thanks for making a quality product! Beautifully packaged and also comes with a small sample of one of their other soaps to try! I just order this Vanilla Oatmeal to try and like it so much that I ordered one for my Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Molly R

customer_reviews.title: Finishes Too Soon
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing and pleasant to smell but each bar finishes very quickly. These bars don’t last as long as other soap, so if you’re looking for a good soap that’s also cost effective, eh.
customer_reviews.author: JenneB

customer_reviews.title: Lovely creamy feeling soap
customer_reviews.text: Loved this soap! Smells sooo good. Makes lovely lather. Like the look, almost looks like an ice cream sundae. Skin feels smooth afterward. Not dry and itchy. Price is right on. Have purchased more expensive soaps and not as satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Denise G Browne

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The soap feels so nice! No hard surface that could scratch my skin, has the right amount of foam, and does not make my skin dry like some other products. I also noticed that the pimples on the back started to fade. I was bummed they popped up like weed after I stopped breastfeeding, and glad the skin has been improved so much by far.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Long Lasting Soap
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using splendor soaps for over a year now and I can’t foresee a need to switch anytime soon. The soaps leave me feeling clean without being completely dried out. The scents are pleasant and lasting without being overwhelming. I usually alternate between the vanilla oatmeal/green tea/rose&charcoal and find all to be of great quality. If properly taken care of, the soap lasts a long time and doesn’t take much to build up a great lather.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Linderman

customer_reviews.title: Soothing& Exfoliating!!
customer_reviews.text: This soap has granules that let you exfoliate as you cleanse. The oatmeal makes it very mild. The vanilla scent is mild🎂
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Grace

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my armpits and pubic area.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap and was incredibly excited about it, I was happy to support a homemade brand. But when I used it for the first time, my armpits and pubic area felt extremely irritated. I did not touch it again after that day. It is a complete shame because the smell is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: When the soap arrived, I really liked the smell. When I used it for the first time, I immediately noticed, from my eczema, I did not itch as bad. It has hard for me to find a soap that does not leave me itching after a shower. My skin felt soft.
customer_reviews.author: Allena Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Correct packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I love the soap, but hate the packaging. It is not sturdy, and generally shows up barely intact
customer_reviews.author: DevilDog8411

customer_reviews.title: I love this soothing Vanilla Oatmeal so much more
customer_reviews.text: I received it as a free sample. It was included with another scent I ordered. I love this soothing Vanilla Oatmeal so much more.
customer_reviews.author: V S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Soap!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap! I won't use anything else now! It smells great, makes my skin feel good, and lasts a long long time! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Holm

customer_reviews.title: Luxury
customer_reviews.text: This is the best soap ever! Love the smell and the look. Lathers really well just let it dry out between use and it will last a long time. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Nice soap. Each bar lasts a few weeks. It smells amazing, leaves a light scent afterwards but is not overwhelming. Moisturizes great. Also like the few ingredients - this is a great bar soap and will definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: MG0928

customer_reviews.title: A nice natural soap
customer_reviews.text: Most soaps leave my skin feeling dry. This one seems to do a nice job of not doing that. I would buy again just wish the bar was just a little bigger for the money you are paying.
customer_reviews.author: mandrews46

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected for the price. I would not/will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Fran A. from Denver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We Love It, and now we wont buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Redhwk44

customer_reviews.title: No Lather
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I were disappointed. The soap doesn't lather well and nor leave your skin feeling soft but does leave your skin feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: bird

customer_reviews.title: Bought Splendor Santa Barbara Soothing Vanilla Oatmeal Pure Coconut Oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought Splendor Santa Barbara Soothing Vanilla Oatmeal Pure Coconut Oil Soap for my husband -- for his beard/face. He absolutely loes the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Racielu

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap to give as a part of a Christmas gift. It smells so good and seems very moisturizing. I plan on buying some for myself in the future.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: Absolute love this soap, bought some for both my daughters
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, makes my skin feel so smooth and non itchy. Splendor has really saved my life!!!

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell!
customer_reviews.text: Dies not smell very good. Now my grandsons fce is broke out too!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells good, has positive effects on skin, moisturizing, improved appearance..Helps ease my skin condition, keratosis pilaris.
customer_reviews.author: portsapeake

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling soap ever!
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells amazing. It leaves your skin soft and smooth with no film. I will definitely buy this again and again. Do not ever want to run out of it! Highly recommend!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE the smell of this and it makes my skin super soft .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SMELLS SO GOOD, LATHERS WELL AND LEAVES MY SKIN FEELING AND SMELLING AMAZING!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soap.
customer_reviews.text: Vanilla Oatmeal and Tea Tree is the bomb. Can't go wrong with these choices.

customer_reviews.title: works very well for eczema
customer_reviews.text: this is the only soap that has helped my son with severe eczema since he was a baby. I tried many different products, many organic soaps and nothing has worked as well as this soap.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the soap
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and leaves skin feeling great. Will be buying again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling of a soft skin after the use.. really good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: I’m on chemo and have sensitive skin, which is why I love this soap.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on chemo and have sensitive skin, which is why I love this soap. It does not irritate my skin like many other products. It has been very helpful.

customer_reviews.title: We tried this one since the one he usually gets is out of stock and we love it. It smells great and his skin is ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy this soap for my boyfriend who has sensitive skin and he loves it. We tried this one since the one he usually gets is out of stock and we love it. It smells great and his skin is super soft!

customer_reviews.title: New found favorite soaps!
customer_reviews.text: We love these soaps, my whole family uses them. Each member has a favorite!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This soap lathers like crazy and feels so good on your skin.

customer_reviews.text: in general this is my favorite brand of natural soap .

customer_reviews.title: Smells good too.
customer_reviews.text: Very soothing soap that doesn't irritate my skin. Smells good too.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but does dissolve a little sooner than other ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but does dissolve a little sooner than other soaps. Wish I could find larger packages so didn't have to order so many times. With that said this soap smells and cleans wonderfully!!!!

customer_reviews.title: as expected works great
customer_reviews.text: Very wonderful product my wife loves it and we will be purchasing more in the future.

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of the soap and it makes me ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of the soap and it makes me feel really clean but doesn't dry my skin out like other soaps.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: This soap smells fantastic and lathers very well
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells fantastic and lathers very well. I've only had it for 2 days but I expect it will last well. LOVE the scent!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Sharp

customer_reviews.title: 5star service.
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy - got myself 1 piece, 2 used for Christmas gifts with creams and scrubs bought separately - very good quality soaps. And I value these self-made gift packs more, as the products are more natural than for example BS. Got an extra sample of lemon grass soap, now thinking to buy :)
customer_reviews.author: SimonaSaule

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap. It doesn't seem to last long though.
customer_reviews.author: ela. k.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Products all came to me well packed I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant with a nice fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: I like the soap very much. It smells nice and is easy on the skin. Much better than regular store bought brands i have here. A bit pricey but good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: WeegieB

customer_reviews.title: Use as hand soap.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as a body bar. I recommend using them hand soap only. The smell is wonderful, I was just hoping for something a bit more gentle.
customer_reviews.author: HeyLady

customer_reviews.title: Great hold! No more drooping 'stache.
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to, if you aren't used to a really stiff wax. This stuff will hold the 'stache through a hurricane. Go to sleep with it in use a little and it goes right into shape. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick S. Oyler

customer_reviews.title: can feel loved me the burn if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes the smell but be careful, can feel loved me the burn if you have sensitive skin. Both wife and I have felt them burn a little.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This soap has a lovely, light vanilla scent that I really like. One bar lasted one and a half months in a household with 3 adults, 2 children, and many guests. It is also moisturizing, which is important to me as I have my hands in water a lot during the day with dishes, cleaning, etc. It holds up to the end without getting mushy and falling apart. I also got a nice surprise lavender sample soap with my order. I am very pleased with this soap, and will definitely order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but a tiny bit more harsh than others by Splendor.
customer_reviews.text: Smells delicious, but it does seem like it is a little more harsh on the skin than the pure coconut one and the tea tree one. There is some tiny bit of grain in the brown side of the soap which is likely the cocoa bits, and added fragrance. So you may want to account for that depending on your skin. However, it does smell fantastic...it's a bit of a trade off. For now, I'll probably stick with the other two I mentioned by Splendor.
customer_reviews.author: Strike Commando

customer_reviews.title: Love this earthly soap
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with the smell/scent and then fell in love with the soap. Great adequate lathering leaves my skin super soft and not dry or oily and without residue. It’s perfect!! Believe me I’ve tried so many soaps . I highly recommend these soaps and continue to purchase them. Only wish I could get a discount because they are a little pricey and don’t last to long . But I love them !!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: ))) I love to try ur different soaps
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be buying hand made soap! However from my first box of soap from Splendor Santa Barbara soap purchased I was hooked. My dry skin has become softer, doesn’t draw up or feel tight. All because I changed soap. Thank you for caring about people and animals. I now buy your soap monthly, and sometimes more....:))) I love to try ur different soaps. I’m hooked.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Best soap for sensitive skins with light scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap brand because they use simple and natural ingredients. The soap comes in a pack of 3, usually with an extra trial piece for another smell. This soap is the favorite of a lot of my friend’s because the scent is really gentle. On top of that, the oatmeal helps people with skin itchiness, like eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Tantan

customer_reviews.title: (which is really great for those who have dry skin and looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap has been adding moisturizing oil to my skin upon daily usage, (which is really great for those who have dry skin and looking for a solution) so much so that I have learned that I have to back off because of the environment that I work in; I work in the subway system, as a mech. brake dust and bacteria on oily skin will cause skin problems, of which that it has. The solution for me was to use your coconut oil sea salt soap, you know switch days for each
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent is overpowering.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, thinking that vanilla oatmeal would be a mild natural scent. I am sensitive to some fragrance. It is too much and there;'s something really flowery in it. I cant be in the room with it. It's on the back porch right now.
customer_reviews.author: ssmtree

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble with irritated skin,looked around for a good option decided I'd give this soap a try ,it is works great !not the manliest smell but it smells good! Bottom line I'll keep this soap on hand.
customer_reviews.author: josh  naughton

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry skin and this soap has significantly changed it for the better. My skin is more moisturized and smoother. I have less itchiness and this has been gentle enough to use on my newborn. The soap is really soft so handle with care and a little goes a long ways. Sleep great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Great for psoriasis!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered.I was very satisfied with the soap.It lathers good so you don't use as much.1 bar lasted me all most 3 weeks.I also have psoriasis and this soap dries it up while also moisturizing.Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: william chasan jr

customer_reviews.title: Small but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not smell like coconut, closer to the sent of baby powder. The soaps are quite a bit smaller then I expected, though they're pretty if you choose to have them on display only.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Softens and smooths
customer_reviews.text: This soap arrived in good condition which was remarkable as it is in the soft side. The softness does not affect the quality. The coconut oil with oatmeal is a good combination. I'm using it mostly for washing my face. However, I'm going to start using it as a hand soap to keep my hands moisturized. I would order this soap again when I run low.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, great for sensitive skin.👌
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell and it was wonderful for my sensitive skin. I usually uses Aveeno products, but I thought I'd switch it up this time and look for some different oatmeal soaps. This one was a little expensive, but a good alternative from my normal routine.👌
customer_reviews.author: non-player character

customer_reviews.title: Not very long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: These feel great and smell fantastic, but they don't last very long, despite keeping them dry between uses. For the price, I just don't think they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: make your friends happy
customer_reviews.text: These soaps are so nice! I give them as gifts quite often and everyone raves about them. Nice, light scent and good quality. They look like an expensive gift but the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing Soap
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have always bought regular old bar soap off the shelf but have been noticing how irritating & drying it is to my skin. I just ordered this soap from Amazon & am amazed at the difference. My skin feels cleaned but moisturized as well. Game changer. Sometimes it is really worth it to try new things :)
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great soap that smells great and doesn't dry out skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncrazy

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, who really enjoys this product for delightful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but is harsh on delicate places
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find soap that doesn't have palm oil. Smells good, but is harsh on delicate places.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful soaps, and they last longer if you put them in a soap dish between uses so they can dry out. Lovely lather and smell.
customer_reviews.author: Deb F.

customer_reviews.title: Sweetness
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap and glad I decided to try it. Smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: RooTwinFlame13

customer_reviews.title: smells great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using in the shower for a week; smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: wonderful soap. smells light and pleasant, works well, suds great and leaves skin feeling clean! will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing. Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding soap. Lathers very well. Smells amazing. Very moisturizing. Checks every box a quality soap should.
customer_reviews.author: Bump

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the lather and the smell, but it stings pretty bad in sensitive areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Splendor Soothing Vanilla Oatmeal Soap- Natural Coconut Oil Hand, Face & Body. Handmade, Vegan, Moisturizing, with Gluten-Free Oats and Antioxidant-Rich Cocoa.…
product_meta.description: SPLENDOR SANTA BARBARA: A company inspired and innovated by a biologist and environmental consultant. We create natural skin care that won't harm personal health or the environment. Using good science and antioxidant rich, earth-healing ingredients, we've eliminated the long list of unpronounceable chemicals found in most products. Our soaps are handcrafted in small batches, cured in the coastal ocean breeze, hand-cut and hand-packaged to be fresh, natural and luxurious every time. We use sustainable packaging and avoid chemical preservatives. Handmade and packaged in Santa Barbara, CA USA The health benefits of coconut oil in cold process soap are amazing. Coconut oil possesses antimicrobial, anti-fungal, anti-bacterial, and antioxidant properties. Our soap is cold-processed.from scratch. It takes time, but we do it the old-fashioned way to retain the natural, moisturizing glycerin that is absent in commercial soap.
feature_bullets: 25% MORE SOAP THAN OTHER HANDMADE BRANDS- 10.5 OZ ( 3/3.5oz bars ) This formula has A RICH CREAMY LATHER and is anti-bacterial, anti-viral, antifungal.

SOOTHING COLLOIDAL OATMEAL: known to help treat skin conditions such as eczema, psoriasis, rosacea, chicken pox and acne. The pain of sunburns, bug bites, poison ivy and other rashes may also be relieved using this home remedy.
ANTI-AGING COCOA: rich in antioxidants and is known to combat free radicals caused by environmental pollutants

NATURAL & MADE IN THE USA- A Warm, Rich, unisex Aromatherapy treatment . Our proprietary home recipe is handmade in small batches in Santa Barbara, CA USA Vegan with Food-grade coconut oil, No Palm Oil, No Alcohol, No Parabens, No Sulfates, No Soy, No GMO's, Gluten-Free, No Phthalates, Not tested on animals, No plastic and No Artificial colors.
CONVENIENCE: ergonomic 3.5 oz size bars, luxury for the whole family, great for guest and hotel soaps, for travel and perfect to give as a beautiful gift in our attractive glossy recyclable box
